descr:
Black, White, and Red all over
Old style color scheme.

Jolly Rancher
A colorful and elegant style. Notes: Does not work in Netscape 4, link backgrounds do not show up in Opera.

Pastel Purgatory
A pastel color scheme, but not as heavy on the pastel colors as Pastel Hell.

Terminal
A color scheme emulating the old green and black monitors. Courtesy of Andrew Kensler.

Parchment
A light white-orange color scheme. Courtesy of Andrew Kensler.

Slate
by youngian. Use with Postmodern interface only.

Libre
by youngian. Use with Postmodern interface only. Incompatible with Internet Explorer.
